pastProjects.name: Complete Basement Renovation - Arlington Heights
pastProjects.description: A comprehensive basement renovation featuring waterproofing, luxury vinyl flooring, recessed lighting, and a full entertainment area. This project transformed a dark, unused basement into a bright, functional family space.

pastProjects.name: Historic Home Basement Restoration - Evanston
pastProjects.description: Careful restoration of a 1920s historic home basement, maintaining architectural character while adding modern amenities and moisture control systems.

pastProjects.name: Modern Basement Office Suite - Chicago
pastProjects.description: Created a professional basement home office with built-in desks, proper lighting, and climate control for year-round comfort.

pastProjects.name: Family Recreation Room - Naperville
pastProjects.description: Full basement transformation into a family recreation room with game area, wet bar, and theater seating for the ultimate entertainment space.
